about_the_game: Cat & Butterfly is a side-scrolling runner with pixel graphics and roguelike mechanics. The Cat is lost in its thoughts when a Butterfly flies by. The cute feline cannot help but chase the colorful insect and gets carried away in pursuit, forgetting time and place. This leads it into dangerous situations and surrealistic environments, to which our four-legged friend will have no choice but to adapt in order to survive.
detailed_description: Cat & Butterfly is a side-scrolling runner with pixel graphics and roguelike mechanics. The Cat is lost in its thoughts when a Butterfly flies by. The cute feline cannot help but chase the colorful insect and gets carried away in pursuit, forgetting time and place. This leads it into dangerous situations and surrealistic environments, to which our four-legged friend will have no choice but to adapt in order to survive.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700F @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
